actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules..

official_title: Resolution to authorize the Committee on Banking and Currency to conduct an investigation and study of all matters relating to the cost and availability of food to the American consumer.

summary.text: Authorizes the House Committee on Banking and Currency to conduct an investigation and study of all matters relating to the cost and availability of food to the American consumer. Requires the committee to report to the House as soon as practicable during the present Congress the results of its investigation and study, together with such recommendations as it deems advisable.

titles.title: Resolution to authorize the Committee on Banking and Currency to conduct an investigation and study of all matters relating to the cost and availability of food to the American consumer.
